info: 为大家制作美食-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Our planet doesn't have a restaurant at the moment, {A惊叹}and some of our Neighbors who can't really cook are already asking for <style=Highlight>gourmet meals</style>!
info: 为大家制作美食-莫白_主流程文本II

content: {A抱歉}Oh, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, pardon me for asking... But if you're free, would you consider helping me take care of our Neighbor's meals?
info: 为大家制作美食-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Good food is a vital part of life. Busy days take a toll, so it's important to eat well and stay energized.
info: 为大家制作美食-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Mo worries, I've added a <style=Highlight>juicer</style> to the Cooking Counter. You can now use it to make all kinds of refreshing beverages. Here are the recipes for today's drinks.
info: 为大家制作美食-莫白_主流程文本II

content: Thank you so much! This time it looks like one of our Neighbors has ordered...{短暂停} {A疑惑}just drinks?
info: 为大家制作美食-莫白_主流程文本II

content: {A抱歉}Could you use the <style=Highlight>juicer</style> to prepare some <style=Highlight>Fruit & Veggie Juice</style> and <style=Highlight>Dazzling Juice</style>? I'll make sure they get delivered on time.
info: 为大家制作美食-莫白_主流程文本II
